name: □ 6 □ Carbon
description:
It was originally made 07-04-18 and is part of a periodic table pack on VJloops //// [ vjloops.com/stock-pack/animated-classic-periodic-table-chemical-elements-orbits-pack-146861.html] ///

The collection on VJLoops.com has been made available to prevent copyminting.

I received information just in time to successfully prevent an actual bad actor who was about to mint the whole collection on opensea. 

In response to this I am making these unique 1/1 edition special atom classics with some of the elements. Be on the watch to see the pop. 


Use the catalog to track down all the Atom Classics tokens
